AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: turned
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was turned by chaos, and left in the wild by parents too soft to do the right thing.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: corrupted
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was from a rich family, but was corrupted by chaos as a babe. [PAWN_possessive] parents hid [PAWN_objective] condition for as long as they could, but eventually had to abandon their child to the wild.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: raider
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is cut from the same cloth as the rest of the herd. [PAWN_pronoun] loves violence, and is as angry and spiteful as could be.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: thrall
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] scrapes by as a menial thrall, abused by the herd. [PAWN_pronoun] is only capable of taking out all the pent up rage during battles, and on prisoners.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: grunt
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an average rough and vile ungor. Mean and spiteful, [PAWN_pronoun] lives to cause pain on any one lesser than [PAWN_pronoun] is.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wildling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born a mutant. [PAWN_pronoun] was left in the wilds like so many other mutant children, by parents too weak to put the babe down. [PAWN_pronoun] was picked up by a wandering gor herd that heard the mutant child wailing in the woods.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: outcast
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a mutant, but was never chased out of the village. [PAWN_pronoun] lived life on the outskirts; never loved yet never fully despised, hiding during the day, and only coming out at night.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: loved
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a mutant, but had parents that could never muster the courage to even abandon their child alone in the woods like so many others did. [PAWN_nameDef] was cared for through childhood, but the future looked bleak since those parents coudn't protect their child forever.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: strange child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a mutant. Abandoned like so many other mutants, [PAWN_nameDef] was left to fend for itself in a passing gor herd. [PAWN_pronoun] was stranger than the rest of the mutant children with a mind deeply touched by chaos throwing [PAWN_nameDef] into mania from time to time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: farm child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't born as a mutant. [PAWN_pronoun] lived life as a farmers child. [PAWN_nameDef] was corrupted by chaos during the early teenage years. When fleeing for [PAWN_possessive] life, [PAWN_nameDef] came across a gor herd passing by, and joined the lower cast like the rest of the ungors.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rich child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't born as a mutant. [PAWN_pronoun] was born into a rich family, and spent childhood studying the arts of an aristocrat. [PAWN_pronoun] was tainted by chaos in his mid teenage years. [PAWN_nameDef] fled for safety from the villages, and came across a gor herd passing by. He was forced in, and joined the lower cast with the rest of the ungors.
